/* USE : VendrOrderMapper.getHqSlipInfo */
SELECT tphvo.SLIP_NO, tphvo.PROC_FG, tphvo.VENDR_CD, thv.VENDR_NM , tphvo.ORDER_TYPE, tphvo.ORDER_DATE, tphvo.ORDER_REQ_DATE , tphvo.ORDER_REG_DT, thereg.EMP_NM AS REG_NM , tphvo.CONFM_DT, theconfm.EMP_NM AS CONFM_NM , tphvo.END_DT, theend.EMP_NM AS END_NM , tphvo.ORDER_QTY * tphvo.SLIP_FG AS ORDER_QTY , tphvo.ORDER_TOT * tphvo.SLIP_FG AS ORDER_TOT , tphvo.IN_TOT_QTY * tphvo.SLIP_FG AS IN_TOT_QTY , tphvo.IN_TOT * tphvo.SLIP_FG AS IN_TOT , tphvo.IN_FIRST_DATE, tphvo.IN_LAST_DATE FROM TB_PO_HQ_VENDR_ORDER tphvo , ( SELECT thv.VENDR_CD, thv.VENDR_NM FROM TB_HQ_BRAND thb , TB_HQ_VENDOR thv WHERE thb.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thv.HQ_BRAND_CD = thb.HQ_BRAND_CD ) thv , TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE thereg , TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE theconfm , TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE theend WHERE tphvo.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tphvo.SLIP_NO = #{slipNo} AND thv.VENDR_CD = tphvo.VENDR_CD AND thereg.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+) = tphvo.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thereg.USER_ID (+) = tphvo.ORDER_REG_ID AND theconfm.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+) = tphvo.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND theconfm.USER_ID (+) = tphvo.CONFM_ID AND theend.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+) = tphvo.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND theend.USER_ID (+) = tphvo.END_ID
